text:
Framestore’s traineeship lasts 12 weeks. On their advertisement they also mentioned that they are willing to hire the best trainees afterwards! Fingers crossed hoping to land an interview! 

Oh no I won’t get to see you there then! Oh well, I hope you enjoy your trip back home! I’m not sure if I’ll be able to go to the October / November ones tbh but I’ll make make a note of them :)
Just saw your blog post on the new snazzy website!! :D The website also has lots of great information! I love it! Good job on the launch! :sparkles:
